content: Radio host Ryan Seacrest is announced to be the successor of Pat Sajak on Wheel of Fortune, approximately two weeks after Sajak announced his retirement effective in 2024.
The Supreme Court issues a ruling 7–2 in Counterman v. Colorado which makes it more difficult to convict people for making threats.
The Supreme Court rules 6–3 against the implementation of the independent state legislature theory in Moore v. Harper.
A freight train carrying hazardous materials derails, causing several cars to fall into the Yellowstone River.
Former Texas congressman Will Hurd launches his presidential campaign.
Hunter Biden agrees to plead guilty to federal tax and firearms charges.
A shooting takes place in Willowbrook, Illinois during a Juneteenth celebration, killing one and injuring twenty-two.
Los Angeles' Metro Rail opens the Regional Connector project to the general public.
Miami mayor Francis Suarez launches his presidential campaign.

In ice hockey, the Vegas Golden Knights defeat the Florida Panthers to win the 2023 Stanley Cup Finals for their first Stanley Cup in franchise history. Jonathan Marchessault wins the Conn Smythe Trophy for playoffs MVP.
